explains: adj. 继续的；持续的；连续的
wordGroup: continuing education 继续教育；成人教育

sentences.en: I am continuing to apply for jobs.
No one would look with favour on the continuing military rule.
sentences.cn: 没有人会支持继续的军事统治。

sentences.en: Continuing violence will retard negotiations over the country's future.
sentences.cn: 持续不断的暴力活动会阻碍关于国家未来的谈判的进行。
